Ella utilities
==============

A buch of utils which can come handy when using Ella CMS.

Originally part of fragapy library, now placed in separate repository for
much easier usage (and no need to install other dependencies than really
required).

Developed and maintained by Fragaria, s.r.o.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2
    :glob: 
    
    ella/multiple_contents
    ella/send_email
    ella/markup
    ella/js_hits
